review_text: Game crashes when I open the shop. Please fix ASAP.
After the update, ads are too frequent. It ruins the experience.
Love the visuals and outfits! Great job.
Please add more levels. I finished everything in 2 days.
Payment failed but money was taken. Need refund!
developer_response: We are investigating this issue. Please contact support.

review_text: It keeps freezing on level 3. Freezes every time.

Good game but loading is slow sometimes.
Please bring back the old daily rewards system.
